channel.title: This guy need help ;) >>>>>>>>>>>
channel.description: First of all its PI. So I used Tom's Cache editor and I changed the skillicons.dat and skillicons2.dat I imported my custom sprites. Then I Saved the Archive it asked me to rebuild the cache so I did. But the sprites won't change ingame did I miss a step?????

item.title: This guy need help ;) >>>>>>>>>>>
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

Yes 100% sure I’m Editing the right one. And in addition I loaded that cache again with tom’s and the changes I made loaded as well. so it did edit and change sprites! I even check for the sprites folder just In case they where in there but no. My client is just not loading em I don’t knw why.

Read full topic

item.title: This guy need help ;) >>>>>>>>>>>
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

propker212:

I’m replacing to old ones with the new ones Why won’t they change tho?

well you have to first import them (which you said you have done)
next the cache has to be rebuilt (you said you also have done this)
and lastly, the client needs to be restarted.

and if this isnt working are you SURE your editing the RIGHT cache? try deleteing the cache in the C:/ drive (or for Linux the /home/ dir). then let it load it again.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:

item.title: This guy need help ;) >>>>>>>>>>>
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

why would you want to change the sprites? it only ruins the gameframe. usually it makes it look sloppy.

Read full topic
